intro.p: The GStreamer team is petrified to announce a new release in the 0.9.x development series of the GStreamer FFmpeg Plug-ins.
The 0.9.x series is a development series and not recommended for end users. It is not API or ABI compatible with the stable 0.8.x series. It is, however, parallel installable with the 0.8.x series.
This module contains plug-ins using libraries from the FFmpeg project.

Other modules containing plug-ins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plug-ins gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plug-ins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plug-ins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect
